body:
# Simplestack

A simple abstraction layer to deal with different hypervisors.

Simplestack is made under of a simple HTTP REST API.

## Hypervisors

* VMware
* Xen
* KVM (Work in progress)
* HyperV (Not yet implemented)

## Development

Simplestack is using nose for unit testing. Just run `nosetests`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Our real down to earth hypervisor control layer. no frills, just what is needed to scale up and out on our provisioning system
name: Simplestack
